metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000637 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: zutils version prior to version 1.8-pre2 contains a Buffer Overflowvulnerability in zcat that can result in Potential denial of service orarbitrary code execution. This attack appear to be exploitable via thevictim openning a crafted compressed file. This vulnerability appears tohave been fixed in 1.8-pre2.

criterions.comment: zutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
